title1: Anonymous online diary for people who are victims of violence “It Seems”
paragraph1: On the platform people can anonymously share their stories and get informational support from the project partners.
paragraph2: The “project wall” is the central part of the platform, where people write stories about violence in their lives. By simply swiping the screen the user can view the basic information at once and read stories, react on and share them.
paragraph3: The user presses a button that opens a page, where he or she can write a story and publish it remaining completely anonymous, as well as get various tips for writing.
paragraph4: Before publishing stories administrators review them and have 4 basic functions for their handling (CRUD). Further, the administrative panel has functions for filtering and analytics.
paragraph5: There is a helper unit on the platform that contains a list of partners, who can provide assistance in different situations, as well as a list of all hotlines. The aim is to list all up-to-date information on the topic on one page for the users’ information.
alt1: Анонімний онлайн-щоденник для людей, які постраждали від насильства «Мені здається» - DForce
alt4: Як написати історію - DForce 1-а сторінка - mobile version - мобільна версія
alt5: Як написати історію - DForce 2-а сторінка- mobile version - мобільна версія
